it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class LobbyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.LobbyController

  • public class LobbyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that controls all the events concerned with the game lobby
    Author:
    Ibrahim El Shemy, Gregorio Galletti, Marco Gasperini
